H0.text: Who was elected president of France follwing the death of President Pompidou. François Mitterrand

H1.text: Who was elected president of France follwing the death of President Pompidou. Jacques Chirac

H2.text: Who was elected president of France follwing the death of President Pompidou. Pierre Messmer

H3.text: Who was elected president of France follwing the death of President Pompidou. VGE

A4.text: In 1974, Giscard was elected President of France, defeating Socialist candidate François Mitterrand by 425,000 votes.
